text: Anton Matusevich (born 30 May 2001) is a British tennis player. Matusevich has a career high ATP singles ranking of 580 achieved on 16 December 2019. Matusevich won the 2018 US Open – Boys' Doubles title. ==Junior Grand Slam titles== ===Doubles: 1 (1 title)=== {|class="sortable wikitable" style=font- size:97% |- !Result !Year !width=150|Tournament !Surface !width=150|Partner !width=150|Opponents !width=150|Score |-style="background:#ccccff;" | style="background:#98fb98;"|Winner |2018 | US Open |Hard | Adrian Andreev | Emilio Nava Axel Nefve |6–4, 2–6, [10–8] |} == Early Life == Matusevich attended The Judd School in Tonbridge from 2012 to 2019. ==External links== * * Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:British male tennis players Category:US Open (tennis) junior champions Category:British people of Russian descent Category:Grand Slam (tennis) champions in boys' doubles
title: Anton Matusevich
